cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Lowtide[/i] — As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, during each of your turns, you may play an additional land each turn.
[i]Hightide[/i] — As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, Zion can't be blocked.

When Zander enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens where X is the number of Islands on the battlefield.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever you tap one or more Merfolk you control to activate an ability, draw a card.

Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.
[i]Hightide[/i] — As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, non-legendary nontoken Merfolk you control have myriad. [i](Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)[/i]
Partnered with Aeces, Azure Sea Crafter. [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Aeces into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.
[i]Lowtide[/i] — As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, that player mills cards equal to the damage dealt to them.
Partnered with Viviane, Blood Sea Shaper. [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Viviane into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
When Crash on the Rocks enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until Crash on the Rocks leaves the battlefield.

[i]Lowtide[/i] — As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, Merfolk you control get +0/+2.
[i]Hightide[/i] — As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, Merfolk you control get +2/+0.
Search your library for an Island, Forest or Plains card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Trample
Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, choose one —
• Target creature you control explores.
• Create a 1/1 green Merfolk Warrior creature token.
• Deep Sea Tritons fights target creature you don't control.

Flying
Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, choose one —
• Tap or untap target creature.
• Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk Rogue creature token.
• Target player mills two cards.

Lifelink
Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, choose one —
• Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn.
• Create a 1/1 white Merfolk Cleric creature token.
• Gain 3 life.

Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, choose one —
• Put a flood counter onto target land. [i](A land with a flood counter on it is an Island in addition to its other types.)[/i]
• Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature token.
• Return target artifact or enchantment you control to its owner's hand.

Counter target spell. 
Put a flood counter onto target land. [i](A land with a flood counter on it is an Island in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Untap each creature you control. Merfolk you control gain Islandwalk until end of turn. [i](That creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Merfolk you control gain Island.)[/i]
Draw a card.

Each player returns each nontoken creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card for each nontoken creature returned to your hand this way.
Exile Viviane's Tsunami.

Choose two — 
• Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.
• Exile target artifact or enchantment.

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
• Target opponent mills four cards.
• Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

When Sunseeker Merfolk deals combat damage to a player, it explores, then draw a card. [i](To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. You may cast a creature card from your hand with mana value X or less without paying its mana cost, where X is the number of Islands you control.

[i]Lowtide[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, as long as you control three or less untapped Islands, target creature you control explores.
[i]Hightide[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, as long as you control five or more untapped Islands, put a flying counter onto target creature you control.

[i]Lowtide[/i] — At the beginning of your combat step, if you control three or less untapped Islands, target creature you control explores.
[i]Hightide[/i] — At the beginning of your combat step, if you control five or more untapped Islands, target creature you control gets +X/+X, where X is the number of untapped Islands you control.

Put a flood counter on up to two target lands. [i](A land with a flood counter on it is an Island in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Draw cards equal the number of tapped Islands you control.

Whenever one or more Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Tap four untapped Merfolk you control: Create two tapped treasure tokens.

You may cast Merfolk spells as though they have flash.
Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Each opponent mills ten cards.
You may have Reflection Merfolk enter the battlefield as another creature you control, except its name is Reflection Merfolk.

Other Merfolk you control have Islandwalk.
Tap four untapped Merfolk you control: Put a flood counter onto target land. [i](A land with a flood counter on it is an Island in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Destroy each creature with power less than the number of Islands you control.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores.
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

Ward {1} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
Whenever Diversion Mystic attacks, tap target creature defending player controls until Diversion Mystic leaves the battlefield.

Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap target land you don't control and put a flood counter on it. [i](A land with a flood counter on it is an Island in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Each opponent mills three cards.

[i]Lowtide [/i]— At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or less untapped Islands, create a tapped treasure token.
[i]Hightide[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more untapped Islands, each opponent mills five cards.

Defender
Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Tap or untap target permanent.
{1}, {T}: Target player mills five cards.

Vigilance
Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
Search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If that card is legendary, untap up to two target creatures you control. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sunken Suit: Target creature explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

[i]Lowtide[/i] — When Coralcrab Statue enters the battlefield, if you control three or less untapped Islands, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add {W}{U}.

[i]Lowtide[/i] — When River Spirit Shrine enters the battlefield, if you control three or less untapped Islands, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add {G}{U}.
Search your library for two basic Island cards, reveal them, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand.

Draw two cards.
You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you tap an Island for mana, add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

Look at the top eight cards of your library, reveal any number of creature cards with power 2 or less from among them. Put all revealed cards into your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
Draw a card.

Put a flood counter on up to two target lands. [i](A land with a flood counter on it is an Island in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Draw a card.

{T}: Add {G}.
Tap four untapped Merfolk you control: Algae Druid explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Islandwalk [i](This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)[/i]
Whenever Pikehunter Triton deals combat damage to a player, create a Food token.
Sacrifice two Food tokens: Pikehunter Triton explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Exile target creature with toughness 4 or less.

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.

Whenever Charmbreaker Merfolk deals combat damage to a player, destroy up to one artifact or enchantment that player controls. If you destroy a permanent this way, its controller creates a tapped treasure token.

Flying
You have no maximum hand size.
Tap ten untapped Merfolk you control: Untap each land you control. Activate only once each turn.

{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.
{G}{W}{U}, Sacrifice Seacrystal Compass: Draw three cards.

[i]Lowtide [/i]— At the beginning of your combat step, if you control three or less untapped Islands, untap target creature you control.
[i]Hightide[/i] — At the beginning of your combat step, if you control five or more untapped Islands, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk Rogue creature tokens, those tokens gain haste until end of turn.

{T}: Add {C}{C}.
[i]Hightide[/i] — {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Activate this ability only if you control five or more untapped Islands. [i](As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, do X.)[/i]

Lifelink
Whenever Pyretic Merfolk untaps, exile up to three target cards from among graveyards. For each land card exiled this way, create a tapped treasure token.
Whenever Triton Warrior becomes untapped, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
[i]Lowtide[/i] — Whenever two or more creatures attack you and you control three or less untapped Islands, create two tapped treasure tokens.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of Islands you control.
[i]Hightide[/i] — As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, you may cast artifact cards from your opponents graveyards.
Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain flying and vigilance until end of turn.
Exile target nonland permanent. You and that permanents controller creates a tapped treasure token.

Create a 8/8 blue Kraken creature token with Islandwalk. [i](That creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Create a 8/8 blue Kraken creature token with Island.)[/i]
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap any number of untapped Merfolk you control.
Gain control of target permanent with mana value X or less, where X is the number of Merfolk you tapped to cast this spell.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. 
[i]Hightide[/i] — As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, whenever you draw a card, each opponent mills two cards. [i](As long as you control five or more untapped Islands, do X.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Paradise Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.
Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Untap Paradise Grove.

[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

[i]({T}: Add {W}.)[/i]
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

[i]({T}: Add {G}.)[/i]
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add one mana of any color that a permanent an opponent controls could produce.

Reefline Shipwreck enters the battlefield tapped.
[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
{T}: Add {G}.

Breathtaking View enters the battlefield tapped.
[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
{T}: Add {W}.

[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
[i]Hightide[/i] — {T}: Add {U}{U}. Activate this ability only if you control five or more untapped Islands.

When Sparkling River enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a tapped treasure token.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

When Sparkling River enters the battlefield, target opponent creatures a tapped treasure token.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

When Sparkling River enters the battlefield, target opponent creatures a tapped treasure token.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.card_name: Cyamiede, Siren of the Seven Seas
cards.rules_text:
[i]Lowtide[/i] — As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, Cyamiede, Siren of the Seven Seas can't be blocked. [i](As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, do X.)[/i]
Whenever Cyamiede deals combat damage to a player, exile target card from their graveyard and put a booty counter on it. Then until end of turn, you may play cards you exiled with booty counters on them.
